backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores per-user preferences (last active tab, accent color, notepad) and user profiles in maps, with access control enforcing that only authorized users can read/write their own data and admins can view any profile.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the ProxyTab redesign feature (centered Google-style landing layout with neon search bar) to its implementation file and associated test/component metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference index for the project's React/TypeScript component and hook files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Colt UI' that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing active tab state, accent color theming with CSS variable injection, backend preference persistence via React Query, animated tab transitions, and rendering of the four main tab components.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Fixed canvas component that renders a subtle grid, 60 drifting neon particles with glow effects, and connecting lines between nearby particles as an animated backdrop.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: Custom cursor overlay with a sharp neon dot, a smoothly trailing ring, and a faint trail dot that change color and scale when hovering interactive elements or clicking.
frontend/src/components/games/ColtAstero: A canvas-based Asteroids clone with neon visuals, featuring ship movement, bullet shooting, asteroid spawning/splitting, lives, scoring, and level progression.
frontend/src/components/games/ColtBreako: A canvas-based Breakout/Arkanoid clone with neon aesthetics, supporting mouse and keyboard paddle control, brick destruction, lives, scoring, and win/lose states.
frontend/src/components/games/ColtPong.t: A canvas-based Pong game with a CPU opponent, supporting mouse and keyboard player control, neon-styled paddles and ball, and score tracking.
A canvas-based lane-switching endless racer game with neon visuals, where the player avoids oncoming obstacle cars using keyboard or mouse click controls.
frontend/src/components/games/ColtTetris: A canvas-based Tetris clone with neon-colored tetrominoes, ghost piece preview, line clearing, progressive speed increase, and score/best-score tracking.
frontend/src/components/games/FlappyColt: A Flappy Bird-style canvas game with a cyberpunk neon aesthetic, featuring a bird that flaps through pipes with gravity physics, score tracking, and keyboard/click controls.
A classic Snake game rendered on an HTML canvas with a neon grid aesthetic, supporting keyboard direction controls, food spawning, collision detection, and score tracking.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: A reusable React card component with a glassmorphism style, supporting optional hover effects with neon color variants (cyan, green, purple, pink).
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header component rendering the COLT UI logo, tab navigation (Games, Proxy, Music, More), and an online status indicator with neon styling.
frontend/src/components/tabs/GamesTab.ts: An arcade hub tab that displays a grid of 7 available mini-games and renders the selected game component with a back-navigation header.
frontend/src/components/tabs/MoreTab.tsx: A settings and utilities tab providing accent color selection, keyboard shortcuts reference, a live clock with stopwatch, and a notepad with save functionality.
frontend/src/components/tabs/MusicTab.ts: A music player tab that lists curated YouTube-embedded tracks by genre and displays an embedded player iframe when a track is selected.
frontend/src/components/tabs/ProxyTab.ts: A React component that renders an in-app browser tab, allowing users to load URLs in an iframe with a URL bar, quick links, loading state, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user preferences and notepad content via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up a cyberpunk/neon design system with Tailwind, custom CSS variables, glass morphism utilities, neon glow effects, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for sensitive values like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the Colt UI frontend, defining a dark cyberpunk theme with neon colors (cyan, green, purple, pink), glassmorphism shadows, custom fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani), and animations like pulse-neon and grid-scroll.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Colt UI project at schema version 9, listing existing features (tabbed navigation, dark neon theme, custom cursor, web proxy, games, music) and architectural notes about the app's layout and design.
